nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The results of the ListDomains action.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when a Amazon DataZone domain was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of an Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when a Amazon DataZone domain was last updated.

nested_items.name: managedAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services account that manages the domain.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A name of an Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: portalUrl
nested_items.description: The data portal URL for the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of domains is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of domains, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListDomains to list the next set of domains.
